name: Nakko-Bazookie
description:
Nakko-Bazookie is a platformer by vgperson based around rocketjumping.

Nakko the cat, inexplicably back on her home planet Ears after the last game, falls in love with a talking bazooka named Bazookie.
But tragedy strikes the couple when one day, the power of rockets is sealed by a mysterious witch!
Now it's up to Nakko and Bazookie to go all over and under Ears to get back what is rocketfully theirs!

Without her trusty rocket pack, Nakko needs to trust in her girlfriend Bazookie to blast her from place to place. The recoil from Bazookie's rockets is pretty significant, so make use of it to reach new heights!

The Readme contains controls, some general tips, and codes to play on Easy Mode or Hard Mode should you wish to push the difficulty either way. (Well, sorta.)

You can get the soundtrack from Bandcamp.
